text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! tumhaare lie vaidh nahin ki striyon ke maal ke zabaradastee vaaris ban baitho, aur na yah vaidh hai ki unhen isalie roko aur tang karo ki jo kuchh tumane unhen diya hai, usamen se kuchh le udo. parantu yadi ve khule roop mein ashisht karm kar baithe to doosaree baat hai. aur unake saath bhale tareeqe se raho-saho. phir yadi ve tumhen pasand na hon, to sambhav hai ki ek cheez tumhen pasand na ho aur allaah usamen bahut kuchh bhalaee rakh de
